name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node copy-files.mjs
scripts.build:bun: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && bun build main.ts --outfile main.js --format iife && node copy-files.mjs
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release: npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Build for release'
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release
